oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Interior shot of Forked Deer Hardware store
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Interior shot of Forked Deer Hardware store. Shows people gathered around and a push lawnmower in the center of the room.

Forked Deer Hardware was established in 1888 and was located on the Main Street of Dyersburg. Dyersburg farmers would often visit the Main Street shops as they waited to process their cotton harvest in the cotton gin located at the end of the street.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: Looking Back at Tennessee Photograph Collection, 1890-1981
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: People; Hardware stores; Agricultural equipment; Clothing & dress
